name: They're Coming To Get You!!!
description:
3D modeling work by Snotbeam - https://snotbeam.itch.io/

Music by Grant Smith - https://grantyoumanywishes.itch.io/

Fonts used from DaFont.com: Feast of Flesh, Aspire, Promenade

Car and meteor models from Sketchfab.com: By Sprint and Brandon Westlake respectively. Zombie models with MakeHuman.

W & S - Walk one step along the grid

A & D - Rotate 90 degrees

Mouse - Look around in current rotation

Space - Wait a turn

Avoid THE FLESH THAT AWAKES and the zombies that would have you for dinner! Escape the graveyard to survive!!!

10/25 update - Bug fixed where player could accidentally end up 6ft under the biggest hill.
